plot: 2014, Roger Klein, a detective of paranormal things must be investigated for his first time in a house. For him it is something new, he is an expert in open places. During his research strange things happen that will discover the truth.
title: Un gran día... o no
plot_es: 2014, Roger Klein, a detective of paranormal things must be investigated for his first time in a house. For him it is something new, he is an expert in open places. During his research strange things happen that will discover the truth.
